title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze rocket propulsion performance and thrust equations in varying conditions.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Study fuel efficiency and combustion chamber design to improve performance.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a rocket nozzle for maximum thrust and minimal drag.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Evaluate understanding of aerodynamic flow and pressure distribution.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Compare subsonic, transonic, and supersonic flow patterns through simulation.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Assess aerodynamic heating impacts and propose effective cooling methods.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Draft a spacecraft frame focusing on strength, material, and mass efficiency.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform orbital mechanics calculations for launch and transfer orbits.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Integrate propulsion, power, and communication subsystems into one spacecraft model.
